name: Slimex
description: Slime Miner is a Web3-based idle RPG where small but mighty slimes explore deep mines to collect rare minerals and earn NFTs and rewards. Participate in tournaments, events, and daily missions to earn more. All you need is: Dig, Upgrade, Repeat! Slime is your tiniest yet richest companion, always digging deeper to uncover treasures and unlock possibilities. We're building the future of Web3 Idle Gaming. With Slime Miner, play turns into profit as adorable slimes uncover treasure and grow strongerâ€”one dig at a time. Join the decentralized gaming revolution!
